@@ -267,0 +282,1 @@

@@ -280,0 +296,32 @@
+
+/* Emit .note.gnu.property section in case of PAC or BTI being enabled.
+ * For more details see "ELF for the Arm速 64-bit Architecture (AArch64)".
+ * https://github.com/ARM-software/abi-aa/blob/main/aaelf64/aaelf64.rst
+ */
+#ifdef __ARM_FEATURE_BTI_DEFAULT
+    #ifdef __ARM_FEATURE_PAC_DEFAULT
+        #define GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE 3
+    #else
+        #define GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE 1
+    #endif
+#else
+    #ifdef __ARM_FEATURE_PAC_DEFAULT
+        #define GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE 2
+    #else
+        #define GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE 0
+    #endif
+#endif
+
+#if (GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE != 0)
+        .pushsection .note.gnu.property, "a"
+        .align  3
+        .long   4          /* name length */
+        .long   0x10       /* data length */
+        .long   5          /* note type: NT_GNU_PROPERTY_TYPE_0 */
+        .string "GNU"      /* vendor name */
+        .long   0xc0000000 /* GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE_1_AND */
+        .long   4          /* pr_datasze */
+        .long   GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE
+        .long   0
+        .popsection
+#endif

@@ -86,1 +86,3 @@
-        ret                             // -8 == 0 words
+        // -8 == 0 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ret
@@ -88,1 +90,3 @@
-        ldr     t0, [s, #16]            // -7 == 1 word
+        // -7 == 1 word
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldr     t0, [s, #16]
@@ -92,1 +96,3 @@
-        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #16]        // -6 = 2 words
+        // -6 == 2 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #16]
@@ -96,1 +102,3 @@
-        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #16]        // -5 = 3 words
+        // -5 == 3 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #16]
@@ -102,1 +110,3 @@
-        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #16]        // -4 = 4 words
+        // -4 == 4 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #16]
@@ -108,1 +118,3 @@
-        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #16]        // -3 = 5 words
+        // -3 == 5 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #16]
@@ -116,1 +128,3 @@
-        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #16]        // -2 = 6 words
+        // -2 == 6 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #16]
@@ -124,1 +138,3 @@
-        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #16]        // -1 = 7 words
+        // -1 == 7 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #16]
@@ -131,2 +147,1 @@
-        str     t6, [d, #64]
-        // Is always aligned here, code for 7 words is one instruction
+        // Is always aligned here, code for 7 words is two instructions
@@ -136,0 +151,1 @@
+        str     t6, [d, #64]
@@ -187,1 +203,3 @@
-        ret                             // -8 == 0 words
+        // -8 == 0 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ret
@@ -189,1 +207,3 @@
-        ldr     t0, [s, #-8]            // -7 == 1 word
+        // -7 == 1 word
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldr     t0, [s, #-8]
@@ -193,1 +213,3 @@
-        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #-16]       // -6 = 2 words
+        // -6 == 2 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #-16]
@@ -197,1 +219,3 @@
-        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #-16]       // -5 = 3 words
+        // -5 == 3 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #-16]
@@ -203,1 +227,3 @@
-        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #-16]       // -4 = 4 words
+        // -4 == 4 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #-16]
@@ -209,1 +235,3 @@
-        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #-16]       // -3 = 5 words
+        // -3 == 5 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #-16]
@@ -217,1 +245,3 @@
-        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #-16]       // -2 = 6 words
+        // -2 == 6 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #-16]
@@ -225,1 +255,3 @@
-        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #-16]       // -1 = 7 words
+        // -1 == 7 words
+        hint    #0x24 // bti j
+        ldp     t0, t1, [s, #-16]
@@ -232,2 +264,1 @@
-        str     t6, [d, #-56]
-        // Is always aligned here, code for 7 words is one instruction
+        // Is always aligned here, code for 7 words is two instructions
@@ -237,0 +268,1 @@
+        str     t6, [d, #-56]
@@ -238,0 +270,32 @@
+
+/* Emit .note.gnu.property section in case of PAC or BTI being enabled.
+ * For more details see "ELF for the Arm速 64-bit Architecture (AArch64)".
+ * https://github.com/ARM-software/abi-aa/blob/main/aaelf64/aaelf64.rst
+ */
+#ifdef __ARM_FEATURE_BTI_DEFAULT
+    #ifdef __ARM_FEATURE_PAC_DEFAULT
+        #define GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE 3
+    #else
+        #define GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE 1
+    #endif
+#else
+    #ifdef __ARM_FEATURE_PAC_DEFAULT
+        #define GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE 2
+    #else
+        #define GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE 0
+    #endif
+#endif
+
+#if (GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE != 0)
+        .pushsection .note.gnu.property, "a"
+        .align  3
+        .long   4          /* name length */
+        .long   0x10       /* data length */
+        .long   5          /* note type: NT_GNU_PROPERTY_TYPE_0 */
+        .string "GNU"      /* vendor name */
+        .long   0xc0000000 /* GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE_1_AND */
+        .long   4          /* pr_datasze */
+        .long   GNU_PROPERTY_AARCH64_FEATURE
+        .long   0
+        .popsection
+#endif
